REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0303 reute u f BC-FINLAND'S-CURRENT-ACC 06-02 0048

TEXT.TITLE: FINLAND'S CURRENT ACCOUNT IN DEFICIT IN 1ST QTR
TEXT.BODY: Finland's current account balance of payments showed a deficit of 2.5 billion markka in first quarter 1987 against a deficit of 3.2 billion in the same period last year, the Bank of Finland said in a statement. REUTER
